stopSound(String) - Method in class com.snap2d.sound.Sound2D
Typically should be used to stop currently playing background music, although because the same SoundSystem is used, passing an identifier to a sound source created elsewhere will still cause the sound to be stopped (although this behavior isn't recommended - you should stop the sound from the same place where it was created).
